title: Volkswagen Weighs First-Ever Germany Plant Closures To Cut Costs
content: Volkswagen AG is considering unprecedented factory closures in Germany in a bid for deeper cutbacks, delivering another blow to Chancellor Olaf Scholz's government.
summary: Volkswagen AG is considering unprecedented factory closures in Germany in a bid for deeper cutbacks, delivering another blow to Chancellor Olaf Scholz's government.

title: UK Immediately Suspends 30 Of Its 350 Arms Export Licenses To Israel
content: Britain will immediately suspend 30 of its 350 arms export licenses with Israel because there is a risk such equipment might be used to commit serious violations of international humanitarian law, foreign minister David Lammy said on Monday.
summary: Britain will immediately suspend 30 of its 350 arms export licenses with Israel because there is a risk such equipment might be used to commit serious violations of international humanitarian law, foreign minister David Lammy said on Monday.

title: 6 Killed, 13 Wounded In Suicide Bombing In Afghanistan's Kabul: Cops
content: A suicide bomber detonated explosives in the Afghan capital on Monday, police said, killing six people and wounding 13 more.
summary: A suicide bomber detonated explosives in the Afghan capital on Monday, police said, killing six people and wounding 13 more.

title: Russia's "Invincible" Nuclear-Powered Nuke Launch Site Detected: Report
content: Two U.S. researchers say they have identified the probable deployment site in Russia of the 9M370 Burevestnik, a new nuclear-powered, nuclear-armed cruise missile touted by President Vladimir Putin as "invincible."
summary: Two U.S. researchers say they have identified the probable deployment site in Russia of the 9M370 Burevestnik, a new nuclear-powered, nuclear-armed cruise missile touted by President Vladimir Putin as "invincible."

title: Navy's P8i Poseidon Aircraft Reaches France, 1st-Ever Deployment In Europe
content: In a first-ever such deployment by India in Europe, an Indian Navy P8i aircraft has landed in France at the Air Base 125 Istres-Le Tube.
summary: In a first-ever such deployment by India in Europe, an Indian Navy P8i aircraft has landed in France at the Air Base 125 Istres-Le Tube.

title: WHO Urges Countries To Accelerate Measures To Reduce Road Traffic Deaths
content: The World Health Organization on Monday called on countries in the WHO South-East Asia Region to accelerate measures to reduce road traffic deaths, a leading cause of mortality among young people aged 15-29.
summary: The World Health Organization on Monday called on countries in the WHO South-East Asia Region to accelerate measures to reduce road traffic deaths, a leading cause of mortality among young people aged 15-29.

title: Turkey Bids To Join BRICS In Push To Build Alliances Beyond West
content: Turkey has formally asked to join the BRICS group of emerging-market nations as it seeks to bolster its global influence and forge new ties beyond its traditional Western allies, according to people familiar with the matter.
summary: Turkey has formally asked to join the BRICS group of emerging-market nations as it seeks to bolster its global influence and forge new ties beyond its traditional Western allies, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Firing Outside AP Dhillon's Canada House, Gangster Claims Responsibility
content: Shots were reportedly fired outside Punjabi singer AP Dhillon's house on Victoria Island in Canada's Vancouver.
summary: Shots were reportedly fired outside Punjabi singer AP Dhillon's house on Victoria Island in Canada's Vancouver.

title: No TV Or Screen For Toddlers At All, Sweden Recommends Parents
content: Children under the age of two should be kept away from digital media and television completely, Sweden's Public Health Agency said.
summary: Children under the age of two should be kept away from digital media and television completely, Sweden's Public Health Agency said.

title: "Melania Trump Hates Donald Trump, Wants Kamala Harris To Win": Ex-Aide
content: The former White House Communications Director Anthony Scaramucci has made a stunning claim - that Donald Trump's wife Melania is secretly rooting for Democrat presidential candidate Kamala Harris.
summary: The former White House Communications Director Anthony Scaramucci has made a stunning claim - that Donald Trump's wife Melania is secretly rooting for Democrat presidential candidate Kamala Harris.

title: Sunita Williams, Butch Wilmore Report Strange Noises From Spacecraft
content: NASA astronauts on board the International Space Station (ISS) have reported strange, unexplained noises coming from the Boeing Starliner spacecraft. This unexpected incident comes just days before Starliner's scheduled undocking and return to Earth
summary: NASA astronauts on board the International Space Station (ISS) have reported strange, unexplained noises coming from the Boeing Starliner spacecraft. This unexpected incident comes just days before Starliner's scheduled undocking and return to Earth

title: Putin Says Kursk Incursion Will Not Halt Russian Advance In Eastern Ukraine
content: President Vladimir Putin said Monday that Kyiv's incursion into Russia's Kursk region will not stop Moscow's advance in east Ukraine and vowed to deal with Ukrainian "bandits" there.
summary: President Vladimir Putin said Monday that Kyiv's incursion into Russia's Kursk region will not stop Moscow's advance in east Ukraine and vowed to deal with Ukrainian "bandits" there.

title: ISIS Is No Longer A Threat, Says Iraq PM
content: Iraqi Prime Minister Mohammed Shia al-Sudani said that the Islamic State (IS) militant group no longer poses a threat to Iraq and dialogue to end the US-led international coalition to fight the IS group continues.
summary: Iraqi Prime Minister Mohammed Shia al-Sudani said that the Islamic State (IS) militant group no longer poses a threat to Iraq and dialogue to end the US-led international coalition to fight the IS group continues.

title: PM's Singapore Visit To Take Ties To "Entirely New Level": Foreign Ministry
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be on an official visit to Singapore on September 4, 5 to further strengthen bilateral ties between the two nations.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be on an official visit to Singapore on September 4, 5 to further strengthen bilateral ties between the two nations.

title: Joe Biden, Kamala Harris To Meet US Negotiating Team On Gaza Hostage Deal
content: President Joe Biden will sit down on Monday with US negotiators pushing for a hostage-release deal in the Israel-Hamas war, the White House said, after the deaths of six captives in Gaza, including an American citizen.
summary: President Joe Biden will sit down on Monday with US negotiators pushing for a hostage-release deal in the Israel-Hamas war, the White House said, after the deaths of six captives in Gaza, including an American citizen.

title: Elon Musk Refers To X By Its Old Name "Twitter", Internet Reacts
content: Elon Musk shared a meme which showed a person lying on a pile of money, with the caption "POV: VPN companies after Brazil banned Twitter."
summary: Elon Musk shared a meme which showed a person lying on a pile of money, with the caption "POV: VPN companies after Brazil banned Twitter."

title: Australian Ex-Childcare Worker Pleads Guilty To Sexually Abusing 60 Girls
content: Former childcare worker Ashley Paul Griffith on Monday pleaded guilty to raping, sexually abusing and exploiting dozens of girls under his care in Australia and Italy.
summary: Former childcare worker Ashley Paul Griffith on Monday pleaded guilty to raping, sexually abusing and exploiting dozens of girls under his care in Australia and Italy.

title: 27 Years After The Great Lego Spill, Toy Pieces Still Washing Up On Beaches
content: Nearly five million Lego pieces were lost at sea when a cargo ship nearly capsized off the coast of England in 1997.
summary: Nearly five million Lego pieces were lost at sea when a cargo ship nearly capsized off the coast of England in 1997.

title: George Clooney Praises Joe Biden For Dropping Out Of US Presidential Race
content: Hollywood star George Clooney has heaped praise on US President Joe Biden over the latter's decision to step down from the 2024 presidential race.
summary: Hollywood star George Clooney has heaped praise on US President Joe Biden over the latter's decision to step down from the 2024 presidential race.

title: Why Are Food Allergies Rising Among Children In UK
content: The number of people in England with food allergies has more than doubled between 2008 and 2018, a new study reveals.
summary: The number of people in England with food allergies has more than doubled between 2008 and 2018, a new study reveals.
